methods.fillChunk:
Populates the given destination chunk with data corresponding to the keys from the given RowSequence.

:param context: (io.deephaven.engine.table.ChunkSource.FillContext) - A context containing all mutable/state related data used in retrieving the Chunk.
:param destination: (io.deephaven.chunk.WritableChunk<? superio.deephaven.chunk.attributes.Values>) - The chunk to be populated according to rowSequence. No assumptions shall be made about
        the size of the chunk shall be made. The chunk will be populated from position [0,rowSequence.size()).
:param rowSequence: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSequence) - An RowSequence representing the keys to be fetched
methods.fillPrevChunk:
Populates the given destination chunk with data corresponding to the keys from the given RowSequence.

:param context: (io.deephaven.engine.table.ChunkSource.FillContext) - A context containing all mutable/state related data used in retrieving the Chunk.
:param destination: (io.deephaven.chunk.WritableChunk<? superio.deephaven.chunk.attributes.Values>) - The chunk to be populated according to rowSequence. No assumptions shall be made
        about the size of the chunk shall be made. The chunk will be populated from position
        [0,rowSequence.size()).
:param rowSequence: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSequence) - An RowSequence representing the keys to be fetched
methods.getChunk:
Returns a chunk of data corresponding to the keys from the given RowSequence.

:param context: (io.deephaven.engine.table.ChunkSource.GetContext) - A context containing all mutable/state related data used in retrieving the Chunk. In particular,
        the Context may be used to provide a Chunk data pool
:param rowSequence: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSequence) - An RowSequence representing the keys to be fetched
:return: (io.deephaven.chunk.Chunk<? extends io.deephaven.chunk.attributes.Values>) A chunk of data corresponding to the keys from the given RowSequence
methods.getChunkType:
Get the most suitable ChunkType for use with this ChunkSource.

:return: (io.deephaven.chunk.ChunkType) The ChunkType
methods.getPrevChunk:
Returns a chunk of previous data corresponding to the keys from the given RowSequence.

:param context: (io.deephaven.engine.table.ChunkSource.GetContext) - A context containing all mutable/state related data used in retrieving the Chunk. In
        particular, the Context may be used to provide a Chunk data pool
:param rowSequence: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSequence) - An RowSequence representing the keys to be fetched
:return: (io.deephaven.chunk.Chunk<? extends io.deephaven.chunk.attributes.Values>) A chunk of data corresponding to the keys from the given RowSequence
methods.isImmutable:
Determine if this column source is immutable, meaning that the values at a given row key never change.

:return: (boolean) true if the values at a given row key of the column source never change, false otherwise
methods.isStateless:
Most column sources will return the same value for a given row without respect to the order that the rows are
 read. Those columns sources are considered "stateless" and should return true.

 Some column sources, however may be dependent on evaluation order. For example, a formula that updates a Map must
 be evaluated from the first row to the last row. A column source that has the potential to depend on the order of
 evaluation must return false.

:return: (boolean) true if this is a stateless column source
methods.makeFillContext:
Allocate a new ChunkSource.FillContext for filling chunks from this FillContextMaker, typically a
 ChunkSource.

:param chunkCapacity: (int) - The maximum size of any WritableChunk that will be filled with this context
:param sharedContext: (io.deephaven.engine.table.SharedContext) - Shared store of intermediate results.
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.ChunkSource.FillContext) A context for use with fill operations
methods.makeGetContext:
Allocate a new ChunkSource.GetContext for retrieving chunks from this GetContextMaker, typically
 a ChunkSource.

:param chunkCapacity: (int) - The maximum size required for any WritableChunk allocated as part of the result.
:param sharedContext: (io.deephaven.engine.table.SharedContext) - Shared store of intermediate results.
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.ChunkSource.GetContext) A context for use with get operations
methods.preventsParallelism:
Can this column source be evaluated on an arbitrary thread?

 Most column sources can be evaluated on an arbitrary thread, however those that do call into Python can not be
 evaluated on an arbitrary thread as the calling thread may already have the GIL, which would result in a deadlock
 when the column source takes the GIL to evaluate formulas.

:return: (boolean) true if this column prevents parallelization

text:
Wrapper ColumnSource that maps current data accessors to previous data accessors (and disables previous data
 accessors).
